page.title: 03Education in Kilbarchan.
page.content: Kilbarchan has two nursery schools, one in the{Steeple Hall}and one in the school grounds.Both the nursery schools are for children aged between 2 and 5 .There is also a primary school in Kilbarchan for children aged 5 to 12. The school is now{108 years {old}and has about{370 pupils in {14 classes.}There are 20 members of staff. The school consists of the 2 big original buildings which are surrounded by 8 classrooms in huts. After you have been 7 years at the primary school you go on to a secondary school. Our local school is {Johnstone High}but there are other ones in the district.
